tika-abh08t46:2_1: Idāni ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā niddese anuppatte sā yassa ñāṇassa anantaraṁ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t46:2_4: Āvajjaniyaṭhānattāti āvajjanakiccaṁ karontaṁ kiriyamanodhātu viya maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā abbohārikameva ubhayavisuddhilakkhaṇābhāvato. Kiñcāpi evaṁ,
tika-abh08t46:2_5: tathāpi vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya pariyosānattā vipassanāpakkhiyamevāti āha ‘‘vipassanāya sotasmiṁ, patitattā vipassanā’’ti.
tika-abh08t46:3_2: tadeva gottaṁ ariyehi asammissā puthujjanasamaññāti pothujjanikagottaṁ.
tika-abh08t46:3_3: Ekavaṁsajānañhi samānā samaññā ‘‘gotta’’nti vuccati, gaṁ tāyati buddhiṁ,
tika-abh08t46:3_9: Tato bhavatīti tato gottato ārammaṇapaccayato bhavati.
tika-abh08t46:3_10: Iti-saddo cettha hetuttho daṭṭhabbo. Tena yasmā tato bhavati, tasmā gotrabhūti attho.
tika-abh08t46:4_2: Taṁ sampādetuṁ panicchatā tena bhikkhunā yaṁ aññaṁ kiñcipi kātabbaṁ, taṁ natthīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t46:4_4: ‘‘Katamevā’’ti vutte ‘‘katha’’nti anuyogassa upaṭṭhitattā ‘‘anulomāvasānaṁ hī’’tiādinā taṁ samattheti.
tika-abh08t46:5_1: Evaṁ uppannaanulomañāṇassa panassa etehi tīhipi anulomañāṇehi attano balānurūpena thūlathūle saccapaṭicchādakatamamhi antaradhāpite sabbasaṅkhāragate cittaṁ na pakkhandati , na laggati,
tika-abh08t46:5_3: sabbaṁ nimittārammaṇampi sabbaṁ pavattārammaṇampi palibodhato upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t46:5_4: athassa sabbasmiṁ nimittappavattārammaṇe palibodhato upaṭṭhite dutiyassa vā tatiyassa vā anulomañāṇassa anantaraṁ gotrabhuñāṇaṁ uppajjati. Tenāha ‘‘tassā’’tiādi.
tika-abh08t46:6_1: Ekantikatāya ekavārameva ca uppajjanato punarāvattābhāvena pana anāvattaṁ.
tika-abh08t46:6_3: Saññaṁ datvā viyāti ‘‘evaṁ uppajjāhī’’ti saññaṁ datvā viya.
tika-abh08t46:6_6: Ettha ca imaṁ upamaṁ āharanti – eko kira issāso aṭṭhausabhamatte padese phalakasataṁ ṭhapāpetvā vatthena mukhaṁ veṭhetvā saraṁ sannayhitvā cakkayante aṭṭhāsi,
tika-abh08t46:6_7: añño puriso cakkayantaṁ āvijjhitvā yadā issāsassa phalakaṁ abhimukhaṁ hoti,
tika-abh08t46:6_9: Issāso daṇḍakasaññaṁ amuñcitvāva saraṁ khipitvā phalakasatanibbijjhati.
tika-abh08t46:6_10: Tattha daṇḍakasaññaṁ dento viya gotrabhuñāṇaṁ, issāso viya maggañāṇaṁ,
tika-abh08t46:6_11: daṇḍakasaññaṁ amuñcitvāva phalakasataṁ nibbijjhanaṁ viya maggañāṇassa gotrabhuñāṇena dinnasaññaṁ amuñcitvāva nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā anibbiddhapubbānaṁ apadālitapubbānaṁ lobhadosamohakkhandhānaṁ nibbijjhananti.
tika-abh08t46:7_0: 1335-8.Anāmatagga…pe… mahodadhinti aṭṭhamabhavato paṭṭhāya nibbattakaṁ aññātakoṭiṁ saṁsāravaṭṭadukkhamahāsamuddaṁ.
tika-abh08t46:7_1: Pāṇātipātādipañcaverāni ceva pañcavīsati mahābhayāni cāti sabbaverabhayāni.
tika-abh08t46:9_0: 1340-3.‘‘Ajānitvāvadanti te’’ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘ekassā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t46:9_1: Pañcamaṁ maggacittanti imināva chaṭṭhassa abhāvadīpanena ‘‘ekaṁ phalacitta’’nti vadato godattattherassa vādopi paṭikkhitto.
tika-abh08t46:10_1: Sotāpannoti vuccatīti sotāpanno nāma dutiyo ariyapuggaloti vuccati.
tika-abh08t46:10_2: So devarajjacakkavattirajjādipamādaṭṭhānaṁ āgamma bhusaṁ pamattopi hutvā kāmasugatiyaṁ sattakkhattumeva sandhāvitvā saṁsaritvā dukkhassantakaraṇasamattho hoti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t46:12_0: Na te bhavaṁ aṭṭhamamādiyantī’’ti. (khu. pā. 6.9; su. ni. 232; netti. 115);
tika-abh08t46:13_0: Rūpārūpalokesu pana na tathā niyamoti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t46:14_1: Tathā ca ‘‘iminā vatāhaṁ maggena āgato’’ti paṭhamaṁ maggaṁ paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t46:14_2: tato ‘‘ayaṁ me ānisaṁso laddho’’ti phalaṁ paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t46:14_3: tato ‘‘ime nāma me kilesā pahīnā’’ti pahīnakilese paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t46:14_4: tato ‘‘ime nāma me kilesā avasiṭṭhā’’ti uparimaggattayavajjhe kilese paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t46:14_5: avasāne ‘‘ayaṁ me dhammo ārammaṇato paṭividdho’’ti amataṁ nibbānaṁ paccavekkhati.
tika-abh08t46:14_6: Iti sotāpannassa pañca paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni honti. Yathā ca sotāpannassa, evaṁ sakadāgāmianāgāmīnampi.
tika-abh08t46:15_3: Pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇañhi sekhānampi hoti vā na vā.
tika-abh08t46:15_4: Na hi sabbeva tattha samatthā honti.
tika-abh08t46:15_5: Teneva hi mahānāmo bhagavantaṁ pucchi ‘‘ko su nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṁ appahīno,
tika-abh08t46:15_6: yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī’’tiādi (ma. ni. 1.175).
tika-abh08t46:15_8: aparena vā samayena kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ tanubhāvakarāya sakadāgāmimaggasaṅkhātāya dutiyāya bhūmiyā adhigamatthāya vipassanāyogaṁ karoti,
tika-abh08t46:15_9: dutiyabhāvo cassa desanāvasena, uppattivasena ca veditabbo.
tika-abh08t46:15_10: Sampayuttānaṁ pana nissayabhāvena te dhammā bhavanti etthāti bhūmi,
tika-abh08t46:15_11: yasmā vā samānepi lokuttarabhāve sayampi bhavati,
tika-abh08t46:15_12: na nibbānaṁ viya apātubhūtaṁ, tasmāpi ‘‘bhūmī’’ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t46:15_13: Ñāṇena parimajjatīti tena tenākārena indriyānaṁ tikkhatarataṁ sampādetvā,
tika-abh08t46:15_14: balabojjhaṅgānañca paṭutarabhāvaṁ sādhetvā lakkhaṇattayaṁ tīraṇavasena parimajjati.
tika-abh08t46:16_4: Gotrabhussa anantaranti ettha gotrabhu viya gotrabhu.
tika-abh08t46:16_7: idaṁ pana taṁsadisatāya pariyāyato gotrabhu. Ekaccasaṁkilesavisuddhiyā,
tika-abh08t46:16_10: Yasmā pana paṭisambhidāmagge ‘‘uppādādiabhibhavanaṭṭhaṁ upādāya aṭṭha gotrabhudhammā samādhivasena uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t46:16_13: tasmā idhāpi ‘‘gotrabhussa anantara’’nti vuttaṁ gottasaṅkhātanibbānato bhūtanti katvā. Dutiyamaggañāṇavaṇṇanā.
tika-abh08t46:17_1: Imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvāti iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekova gahito.
tika-abh08t46:17_2: Ekacco hi idha sakadāgāmiphalaṁ patvā idheva parinibbāyati,
tika-abh08t46:17_5: ekacco devaloke patvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyatīti ime cattāropi idha na gahitā.
tika-abh08t46:17_6: Yo pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṁ vasitvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyati, ayamekova idha gahitoti.
tika-abh08t46:17_8: bhave vā antakaro bhavassa antakaroti attho.
tika-abh08t46:17_10: Byāpādakāmarāgānaṁpahānāyāti tesaṁyeva sakadāgāmimaggena tanukarānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ niravasesappahānāya. Tatiyamaggañāṇavaṇṇanā.
tika-abh08t46:18_3: Tatthevāti suddhāvāse vā aññattha vā yattha uppanno, tattheva parinibbāyi.
tika-abh08t46:18_4: Anāvattisabhāvoti tasmā lokā idha paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena imaṁ lokaṁ punarāgamanābhāvato anāvattanasabhāvo,
tika-abh08t46:18_6: Rūparāgādipahānāyāti rūparāgaarūparāgamānauddhaccaavijjāsaṅkhātānaṁ pañcannaṁ uddhambhāgiyasaṁyojanānaṁ niravasesappahānāya. Viddhaṁsāyāti vināsāya. Catutthamaggañāṇavaṇṇanā.
tika-abh08t46:19_2: Na hi cūḷakhīṇāsavo nāma atthi. Anuppatto sadattho sakattho,
tika-abh08t46:19_6: attano paramatthaṭṭhena ca attano atthattā ‘‘sadattho’’ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t46:19_9: Catassopīti sotāpattimaggo sakadāgāmimaggo anāgāmimaggo arahattamaggoti catassopi.
